h2_title: Where to Find the Macaque Chief
content: Instead of permanent clones, he can also fly up and create kamikaze versions of his shadow clones to fly at you for a single slash, while he prepares a mighty slash of his own as a third and final shadow comes your way.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Macaque_Chief.md', within the main section titled 'Macaque Chief', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Macaque Chief' and the sub-subsection 'Final Encounter - Mahavira Hall'.
The content is as follows:
Instead of permanent clones, he can also fly up and create kamikaze versions of his shadow clones to fly at you for a single slash, while he prepares a mighty slash of his own as a third and final shadow comes your way.
